cu.explanation_en: Setting nr_cellid to -1 (negative value) will cause configuration errors and prevent cell identification.

du.explanation_en: Setting ra_ResponseWindow to 100 (invalid value, valid options 1,2,4,8,10,20,40,80) will cause configuration validation failure and prevent RACH setup.
du.explanation_zh: 將 ra_ResponseWindow 設定為 100（無效值，有效選項 1,2,4,8,10,20,40,80）會導致配置驗證失敗，並阻止 RACH 設定。
